title: Mum's Cranberry Chutney
ingredients: ['450g fresh or frozen cranberries', '250ml water', '400g caster sugar', '2 (10cm) cinnamon sticks', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '80g chopped onion', '160g sultanas', '100g thin apple slices', '100g thin pear slices', '60g sliced celery', '50g flaked almonds', '2 teaspoons lemon zest']
